posts.post_content:
This card is in stellar condition, but unfortunately someone tried to "scissor it up" a little on the top to make it look as sharp as possilble...very nice otherwise.  One more note...on the back, upper right edge there is a portion chipped off of the slab...it's been like this for a while b/c it's never left the plastic since I'ved owned it and there isn't a chipped piece in the plastic.

$$SOLD$$dlvd/paypal gift or owed

PM or email me: [url]cavelyon@aol.com[/url]
